title: Need silvers/gold ranked 5s team
body: We're currently recruiting ACTIVE players to join our ranked team. We have 3 spots for mid support and top mains. Add me if you're interested. Team is currently unranked.

replies.body: gold 3 adc/mid main, can play jungle fairly well :P

ID: Raito
prefer mid or top
GOLD 5 lokking for a team for any team rank

Heyy :)
Im a support main, my main champions are Janna, Leon, Thresh and Morgana. However I can still play other supports. I have an analyst coach I guess you could call him who is diamond 3, who has also agreed if you like he will coach/analyse our games etc. He is a diamond adc main! :) He is also the shot caller for his Diamond 3's ranked team! Thanks and please let me know!

IGN: Natsu298

hey man im a S3 was gold 3 last season i main mid lane starting to get over solo que due 2 afks n trolls want a serious team with trainings and team comps i use team speak or skype am willing to take advice and work on team building,map awerness around objectives etc so add me if ur interested
Top main gold v here interested in joining ill send you a invite so hopefully we can play together
Would you be interested in having a plat 2 for mid in your team?
